name: Quickpay – WordPress Payment Plugin
author: Bluecube Ltd

sections.description:
Quickpay is plugin that lets you request and recieve payments from your users via Mobile Money in uganda both on AirtelMoney & Mtn Mobile Money with ease. Works standalone and with WooCommerce.

Simply insert the above shortcode on any page and the Quickpay form will be displayed.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Request online payments
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

To use the plugin, Simply create an account on Quickpay

Visit developer settings on the menu and create the api credentials. Copy the Api Key and save it under the quickpay plugin settings on the WordPress admin panel.

Simply insert the above shortcode on any page and the Quickpay form will be displayed.

How do I add the Quickay form to the front-end?

Insert the above shortcode on any page and the Quickpay form will be displayed.
